sentences.sContent: We women have a lot of good business skills, although we tend to underrate ourselves.
sentences.sCn: 我们女性有许多好的商业技能，只是我们往往低估自己。

remMethod.val: under(不足， 少于) + rate(估价) → 低估

trans.tranOther: If you underrate someone or something, you do not recognize how intelligent, important, or significant they are
